content.text:
HON. TIMOTHY J. WALZ

                              of minnesota

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 15, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. WALZ. Mr. Speaker, I was absent for Roll Call No. 624 (on the 
passage of H.R. 3071). Had I been present, I would have voted yes.
content.speaker: Mr. WALZ
